description: If you're a huge Florida fan, this is the app for you! Florida Baseball Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team!  Plus you’ll find detailed team, roster and schedule information, so you’ll always be the most knowledgeable fan in the room.   You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Florida fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard!   There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Florida. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Florida Baseball Fans today!   ** Arctic Gerbil Creations, Brighthouse Labs, and the Florida Baseball Fans application are in no way associated with MLB or the Florida Marlins baseball team. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
